title: Barazushi
paragraphs: Barazushi is a gear brand in Splatoon 3. Barazushi gear accessories have a 5× higher chance to roll Intensify Action, and a 0.5× chance of Sub Power Up.
According to the Squid Research Lab, Barazushi makes high-quality gear for deserts and cold regions.[1][2]
For the category page, see Category:Barazushi.
Reaching a cumulative amount of stars on Barazushi gear will reward the player with badges.
Barazushi is a Japanese dish in which seafood, vegetables, and other ingredients are put on top of or mixed into rice.
